description: Non-Material Amendment to Planning Permission ref: 21/02435/FUL (Development of new themed land including a new rollercoaster and childrens rides along with associated buildings, structures, landscaping and incidental works) dated 22/01/2022. Amendment to add condition which confirms the restricted use of the approved ride maintenance building for the use of maintenance of machinery and fixed plant only.
decision_conditions: The maintenance building as shown in approved drawing CWPG-SA-07-GF-DR-A-0101 Rev P1.02 shall not be used other than for the purpose of inspecting or maintaining fixed plant or machinery.Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and to comply with the terms of the application.
